name: EL JEFE PRIMO SALSA
description:
EL JEFE PRIMO SALSA app is a gift from EL JEFE to all of his fans, new and old. If you love his hot sauce, you will love this game. You must to be quick on your fingers to defeat EL PIÑATO the crazy wrestling piñata. Don’t let his taunts distract you from your victory.

Fighting Tip: in order to be at your strongest, you must have a fire in your belly. Just eat some of my hot sauce (in three delicious flavors: Verde, Picante and Volcán). Perfect with chips, burgers, pizza, french fries, eggs, breakfast, lunch and dinner, you name it. Now get out there and beat the sauce out of EL PIÑATO!

EL JEFE PRIMO SALSA, put it on everything!
